name: UpdateHubspotUser
description:
Update user details in HubSpot CRM.

This tool updates specific user information in HubSpot CRM for a given user ID or a unique property value if specified. Use this tool when you need to modify or clear user property values, bearing in mind read-only and non-existent properties will cause errors.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The internal user ID or unique property value to identify the user for updating.

parameters.name: user_properties_to_update
parameters.description: A JSON object containing key-value pairs of user properties to update. Specify properties to modify or clear.

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

parameters.name: unique_property_name
parameters.description: Specifies the name of a property with unique values for identifying the user object. Use this if not using userId.

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: idProperty
parameters.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
